places.name: Morangaba Waterfall
places.info: Located in the Serra do Japi region, it is considered one of the most beautiful waterfalls in the municipality. However, it is important to check access in advance, as it is private property, and during the pandemic, access was restricted.
places.address: Av. Luiz Gobbo - Aglomeração Urbana de Jundiai, Jundiai - SP

places.name: Serra do Japi Trail
places.info: This challenging trail offers an immersion into the local biodiversity, with approximately 16 km (round trip). Along the way, visitors can enjoy various natural landscapes and, on some routes, encounter waterfalls such as the Jabuticabeiras Waterfall.
places.address: Torre da TV Cultura - Santa Clara, Jundiaí - SP

places.name: Paraiso Trail
places.info: With about 9.4 km (round trip), this medium-difficulty trail takes visitors to the Paraíso Waterfall, providing a refreshing experience in the heart of nature.
places.address: Atilio Gobo, 4600 - Santa Clara - Jundiai - SP

places.name: Córrego dos Morcegos Trail
places.info: This trail, approximately 8.4 km (round trip), runs through more humid and dense areas, following the Córrego dos Morcegos (Bats' Stream) and passing by numerous jabuticaba trees.
places.address: Rua Joao Leme do Prado Vila Jundiainopolis, Jundiai - SP

places.name: Pedra da Baleia Trail
places.info: Located in the southernmost part of Jundiaí, this easy-level trail leads to the top of Pedra da Baleia (Whale Rock), offering a panoramic view of the city. It is a great option for beginners in hiking.
places.address: Atravessa, R. Benedito dos Santos - Jardim Palermo, Jundiai - SP

places.name: Biquinha Trail
places.info: With a low difficulty level, this 1.8 km trail offers panoramic views of Jundiaí, passing through riparian forests and small waterfalls. It is ideal for environmental education programs and family visits.
places.address: Tamega Avenida Brasil Serra do Japi, SP

places.name: Jabuticabeiras Trail
places.info: This trail, approximately 10 km (round trip), takes visitors to the Jabuticabeiras Waterfall, providing a refreshing dip. The route is filled with jabuticaba trees, offering a unique experience in the Serra do Japi.
places.address: Av. União dos Ferroviários, 1760 - Pte. de Campinas, Jundiai - SP

places.name: Mirante Trail
places.info: This trail offers a moderate hike that culminates at a viewpoint with a panoramic view of the region, allowing visitors to appreciate Jundiaí’s natural beauty from a privileged spot.
places.address: Parque Estadual Furnas do Bom Jesus
